full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Title {Canlà Title in French}
EC015-231435A - New Breakwater at Lamèque Wharf, Lamèque, New Brunswick

### Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Reference Number: WS3800727692
* Publication Date: December 22, 2022
* Tender Closing Date and Time: January 12, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

### Contract Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End-User Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Regions of Opportunity: New Brunswick
* Regions of Delivery: New Brunswick

### Description of Requirement

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) requires the construction of a new rubble mound breakwater at Lamèque Wharf, located in Lamèque, New Brunswick. The breakwater is expected to be completed within 10 weeks after contract award.

### Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Pre-qualification Requirements

A bid security will be required as part of the tender submission.

### Contact Information

* Adam Beaumaster, Contract Manager
* Phone: Not available
* Email: adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Documents

Please see below for links to additional information related to this tender:
